channel.title: hiRowan - site of Rowan
channel.description: Recent content on hiRowan - site of Rowan

item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: Git极简文档
item.description: 1. git 常用命令 1.1. 查看帮助信息 1 2 3 4 5 6 # 查看git 本身帮助信息 git --help # 查看某命令的帮助信息 git <command> -h git log -h 1.2. 配置信息 1 2 3 4 5 # 查看配置信息 git config --list

item.title: Uml极简文档
item.description: 1. Relationships Inheritance: 继承， is-a Association: 级联，有关联，但关系不大 表示一种平白的弱关系，比如，羊和草 Aggregation: 聚合，consist of，由…组成，注意生命周期可
